attributes.action: Give the U.K people a referendum on entry into Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the U.K Government to make good on their promise to give the U.K people a referendum on entry into Europe. This does not mean trying to sell Europe to us under another name or treaty, we all know that the current treaty is basically the same as the failed European Constitution voted on last time, remember the Government might sign us up via the back door but until we vote and have our say the Government is on its own.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
